folder.name: Use Synapse Studio to analyze and visualize data via Azure Synapse serverless SQL pool

content.query:
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'

SELECT decennialTime, SUM(population) AS Pop
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://challengedl.dfs.core.windows.net/challenge-fs/aggregated_data/*.parquet'',
        FORMAT=''PARQUET''
    )  AS [result]
GROUP BY decennialTime

'
